pullrequest.title: Manager with Camera sensor and example

content.raw:
We might want to make these `REQUIRED`.

Also might want to something like:

```
list(APPEND @PKG_NAME@_INCLUDE_DIRS ${IGNITION-MATH_INCLUDE_DIRS})
list(APPEND @PKG_NAME@_LIBRARY_DIRS ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARY_DIRS})
list(APPEND @PKG_NAME@_LIBRARIES ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES})
```

The above would shorten the `save_image` example CMakeLists.txt to:

```
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5 FATAL_ERROR)
find_package(ignition-sensors0 REQUIRED)
add_executable(save_image main.cc)
target_include_directories(save_image PUBLIC
  ${IGNITION-SENSORS_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(save_image PUBLIC
  ${IGNITION-SENSORS_LIBRARIES})
```
